title: Glass noodle salad with crab and chicken
description: Glass noodles are usually made of mung bean and are therefore called mung bean thread. They are never fried but sometimes used in soups and such like. When re-hydrating just cover with cold water and leave the rest to time.
ingredients: small handful coriander, Thai basil and mint leaves
2 garlic cloves, peeled but left whole
2 long red chillies, seeds removed from one
50g/1¾oz ground roast rice (available online and in Thai groceries)
